column4: ï»¿why can't I access my windows shares using the name of the pc (odin), but I'm able to access it via it's ip address (192.168.1.5)??
do you have dns resolution setup? ie can you ping the computer by name?
I haven't got a done solution to this.. but samba has this other name resolution thingy.. nmdb.. I don't know much about it but you might want to check the docs for samba
hmm.. that works for me.. but I can't remember setting up nmdb.. well.. sorry I can't be of more help
